it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.remote

Class RMIMessageProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.remote.RMIMessageProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMIMessageProxy, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIMessageProxy
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RMIMessageProxy, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class is used as a communication channel between the server and the client. Its methods are invoked by the remote client and take or add messages from and to the output and input message queues
    Author:
    Carlo Dell'Acqua
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      A callback that will be called once this object is closed

      The associated RMIView needed to interact with its message queues

      RMIMessageProxy(RMIView view, java.lang.Runnable closeCallback)

      • RMIMessageProxy

        public RMIMessageProxy(RMIView view,
                       java.lang.Runnable closeCallback)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Constructs an RMI Message Proxy, an object which emulates an IO stream with the client
        Parameters:
        view - the RMI View associated with this proxy
        closeCallback - a Runnable which will be called once this class is closed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error concerning the RMI API occurs

    • Method Detail

      • receiveMessage

        public Message receiveMessage(int timeout,
                              java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                              java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Method called by the client to receive messages waiting in the output queue
        Specified by:
        receiveMessage in interface RMIMessageProxy
        Parameters:
        timeout - a maximum timeout
        unit - the time unit of the specified timeout
        Returns:
        the received message
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is forced to stop
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the maximum timeout has been reached without obtaining any message

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message message)
        Method called by the cliet to send messages enqueueing them in the RMIView's input message queue
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in interface RMIMessageProxy
        Parameters:
        message - the message the client want to send
